[h3]What happened to the HLDSUpdateTool? Why can't I download or update servers from it?[/h3]All Steam game servers now use SteamCMD to download and update game server files. HLDSUpdateTool has been retired and will no longer function.

[h3]How do I setup and use SteamCMD to install and update my game servers?[/h3]For more information on installing and using SteamCMD, please see the [url=https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/SteamCMD]Valve Developer Wiki[/url] which includes the latest information on SteamCMD.

[h3]Where can I find a list of supported games?[/h3]For a list of dedicated servers and games that SteamCMD supports on Steam, please see the [url=https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List]Dedicated Servers List[/url].

You can also post questions and search for help in [url=http://steamcommunity.com/discussions/#tools]Steam Discussions[/url].

[h4]Third Party Dedicated Server Resources[/h4][list]      [*][url=https://forums.alliedmods.net/forumdisplay.php?f=129]AlliedMods.Net[/url][/*]      [*][url=http://www.srcds.com/]SRCDS.com[/url][/*]  [/list]

[section style=note]  [h3]Note:[/h3]Steam Support does not provide support for mods or game servers. Please use the above resources for assistance with game servers on Steam.[/section]
title: How do I download, install and update a standalone dedicated server?
